code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import finalData from"../../dataFinal.json";export var restaurantsSlice=createSlice({name:"restaurants",initialState:{value:finalData.restaurants,chefOfTheWeek:finalData.chefOfTheWeek},reducers:{filterRestaurants:function filterRestaurants(state,action){var filterType=action.payload;switch(filterType){case"all":state.value=finalData.restaurants;break;case"new":state.value=finalData.restaurants;state.value=state.value.filter(function(restaurant){return restaurant.isNew===true;});break;case"most popular":state.value=finalData.restaurants;state.value=state.value.filter(function(restaurant){return restaurant.isPopular===true;});break;case"open now":var timeNow=new Date();var currentHour=timeNow.getHours();state.value=finalData.restaurants;state.value=state.value.filter(function(restaurant){return restaurant.openHour<=currentHour&&restaurant.closeHour>currentHour;});break;case"chef of the week":state.value=finalData.restaurants;state.value=state.value.filter(function(restaurant){return restaurant.chefID==state.chefOfTheWeek;});break;default:state.value=state.value;}}}});var filterRestaurants=restaurantsSlice.actions.filterRestaurants;export{filterRestaurants};export default restaurantsSlice.reducer;
